Portfolio

Google Sitemap Generato

October 02, 2007

A spiffing online Google XML sitemap generator tool. Also, create HTML sitemaps for your t’internet site and CSV sitemaps for Yahoo. Pretty sweet. If you dont know what a Sitemap is read the below, mmmkay.

“By placing a formatted xml file with site map on your webserver, you enable Search Engine crawlers (like Google) to find out what pages are present and which have recently changed, and to crawl your site accordingly.”

XML-SITEMAPS.COM

Need a web site for your organisation? Contact Ai New Media for a quote.
